name: Dripto
description: Dripto is the first and only resale marketplace where sneakers, streetwear, and luxury items are purchased and sold with cryptocurrency. Building the platform on the blockchain gives Dripto key advantages over competitors, specifically in terms of loyalty rewards whereas other platforms only offer lowered fees based on account standing. Dripto implemented an innovative set of protocols centered around the user, allowing us to reward platform users and investors with utility NFTâ€™s, passive income opportunities, verifiably random giveaways, payment for simply listing, and platform credit, with upcoming expansion into Metaverse-based rewards. The mission is to connect streetwear culture and crypto technology to provide a real-world use case for crypto while simultaneously revitalizing the streetwear market by offering a much-needed novel alternative Liquidity Lock: https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/uni-v2/pair/0x85c26aef6f5186ce61622897a0160dc2c6342d36 White paper: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lbJSRTnbTOyyV5vzh5GzxD-WvT6f7qYY/view Partners: ChainLink: https://twitter.com/chainlink/status/1509308778390474755?s=20&t=ZDUdj6q9axTCYN4P7BDCng https://twitter.com/Smart_Contract/status/1509200528638500871?s=20&t=ZDUdj6q9axTCYN4P7BDCng Andersoncollaborative: https://www.andersoncollaborative.com/ Undeadstock: https://www.undeadstock.co/ Northequities: https://northequities.com/
